自定义分类-首页轮播图
snippets.code:
function slide() {
	$labels = array(
		'name'               => _x( '首页轮播图', 'post type 名称' ),
		'add_new'            => _x( '新建轮播图', '添加新方案的链接名称' ),
		'add_new_item'       => __( '新建一个轮播图' ),
		'edit_item'          => __( '编辑轮播图' ),
		'new_item'           => __( '新轮播图' ),
		'all_items'          => __( '所有轮播图' ),
		'view_item'          => __( '查看轮播图' ),
		'search_items'       => __( '搜索轮播图' ),
		'not_found'          => __( '没有找到轮播图' ),
		'not_found_in_trash' => __( '回收站里面没有轮播图' ),
		'parent_item_colon'  => '',
		'menu_name'          => '首页轮播图'
	);
	$args = array(
		'labels'        => $labels,
		'description'   => '轮播图',
		'public'        => true,
		'menu_icon'     => 'dashicons-format-image',
		'menu_position' => 16,
		'supports'      => array( 'title',),
		'has_archive'   => true
	);
	register_post_type( 'slide', $args );
}
add_action( 'init', 'slide');
